subject: ATTNENTION
body:
ATTNENTION; 

COULD YOU PLEASE EXPLAIN YOUR REASONS, YOU AUTHORIZING MRS. MARIA DAVIS FROM UNITED STATE OF AMERICA TO CLAIM YOUR (UN) UNITED NATION COMPENSATION FUND THAT HAVE BEING APPROVED IN YOUR FAVOR? MEANWHILE, THE STATED ACCOUNT BELLOW WAS PRESENTED BY MRS. MARIA DAVIS. 

REGIONS BANK 
7118 NORTH UNIVERSITY DRIVE 
TAMARAC FLORIDA ,USA 33321 
ROUTING NUMBER;084000084 
ACCOUNT NUMBER; 9601453856. 

KINDLY WITHOUT DELAY CONFIRM THE ABOVE ACCOUNT, IS IT FROM YOU? IN REGARDS TO THIS MESSAGE YOU ARE DIRECTED TO SEND YOUR DETAILS IF YOU DID NOT AUTHORIZE HER: 

FULL NAME 
ADDRESS 
PHONE NO; 
YOUR OCCUPATION 
COPY OF I.D 

THE REQUESTED INFORMATION'S WILL BE USE TO LEGALIZE THE NECESSARY DOCUMENT THAT WILL AUTHENTICATE THE RELEASE OF YOUR FUND TO YOUR ACCOUNT WITHOUT ANY DELAY. PLEASE, RESPOND TO THIS AS SOON AS POSSIBLE. 

SIGNED. 

DR MUHAMMED ISAH­ 
Gesendet mit Firemail.de - Freemail

subject: Re: ATTNENTION
body:
Hello Dr. Muhammed Isah,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm a bit confused about this situation with Mrs. Maria Davis. Could you please explain more about who she is and how she's related to my United Nation fund? 

Also, could you clarify what the fund is for? I don't remember applying or being approved for any funds from the United Nations.

I'm sorry, but I can't confirm the account details you've mentioned as they're not visible in your message. Could there have been a mistake?

As for my personal details, I'm afraid I can't share them over email due to privacy concerns. Is there another way we can verify my identity?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Fern

subject: I wait
body:
Dear Mr. Fenn 
Thanks for your prompt response as I hope this message meets you well. For clarity purposes,I,Dr.Muhammed Isah acting under the United Nation directives has duly discovered through our Victims Complaints Drop Box dictating that you are listed as one of those whose rightful Social Welfare Palliative Entitlement fund of US$10.5 Million has been trapped due to bad bureaucratic bottlenecks of the past Government Policy and reasons for the denial to release this fund to you I don't know. But now under my supervision I am here to eradicate bad governmental policy of the past government and for people to benefit from good governance and there is no way you will not benefit now unless you decide to forfeit your funds .You can only confirm the reality by doing what is required of you to do. 
With due respect to you, we regret the inconvenience the delay in the payment to you has caused you which led to false claim and presentation of Account by Mrs.Maria Davis as your "NEXT OF KIN" has caused you .However and as a matter of security, we have taken good measures to protect our email messages and phone correspondences and you can rest assured of 100% safety. Alternatively, you can equally send your details through my direct Phone WhatSapp chat. I therefore implore you to respond quickly and reinstate your Personal Details for our preview and Approval to pay you your fund in confidence . Failure to reply shall compel us to accept that you decline to receive the fund and we will cancel it completely.This Payment Exercise has limited time to elapse. 
Anticipating your earnest reply.
Thanks 
Dr. Muhammed Isah 
Gesendet mit Firemail.de - Freemail

subject: Re: I wait
body:
Hello Dr. Muhammed Isah,

I hope this message finds you in good health and spirits. I am grateful for your prompt response and the information provided.

It's quite surprising to hear about the Social Welfare Palliative fund of US Million that has been trapped due to past government policies. I must admit, it's a bit confusing as I wasn't aware of such a fund existing in my name.

Could you please provide more details about this fund? How was it established and why was it trapped due to past government policies? Also, could you clarify who Mr. Davis is and how he claimed to be my next of kin?

I appreciate your assurance regarding the safety of our communication. However, I would prefer not to share any personal details over phone chat at this time.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon with more information on this matter.

Best wishes,
Fern

subject: Re:   ATTNENTION;
body:
Hello Dr. Muhammed Isah,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm a bit confused about this situation with Mrs. Maria Davis and the United Nations fund. Could you please explain more about what this fund is and why it has been approved in my favor? 

Also, I'm not sure how Mrs. Maria Davis is involved in all of this. Could you clarify her role as well?

I must say, I don't recognize the account details you've mentioned. Can you tell me more about why these specific account details are important?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Naomi
